intro: Hey, I'm a frontend developer with 4 years of experience, focusing on creating user-friendly UI.
description1: This is my personal website, where I share my writing, projects, and various other content I want to showcase.
description2: Currently, I'm working as a frontend developer at E8ight on the Platform Development Team, and developing B2B SaaS platforms like PMIS (Project Management Information System) and EPC (Engineering, Procurement, Construction) solutions.
